# Prophets

## Pronunciation

- /ˈpɹɒfɪts/
- /ˈpɹɑfɪts/

## Meanings

### Noun

Someone who speaks by divine inspiration.

> Muslims believe that Muhammad was the final prophet sent to mankind.

---

Someone who predicts the future; a soothsayer.
